name: Symbiote
description: A proactive GitHub automation agent that responds to configured events and commands.

executionBranch.description: The branch to use for the Symbiote workflow.

pollIntervalSeconds.description: Interval in seconds between polling for user events.

eventsPerPage.description: Number of events to fetch per API request (max 100).

maxRuntimeHours.description: Maximum runtime in hours before automatic restart (We always keep a safety buffer of 1 hour; so 6 = 5 hours max runtime).

runtimeCheckIntervalMinutes.description: This is the interval at which the server will check if it should restart.
